short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a gallery of the images on the current page with filtering and sorting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking through a confusing image gallery or trying to find the largest version of an image on a page? Open the Page Gallery and see every image in a handy overview with filtering and sorting!

Recent updates (September 2024): I have rolled back a recent feature that added support for more websites, but sadly made some websites work less reliably. Hopefully I will be able to reintroduce an improved version of this feature at some point in the future.
